    public class FileBrowser
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
implements OriginPanel, HasDocumentEvent, HasFolderEvent, HasMailEvent, HasDocumentHandlerExtension, HasFolderHandlerExtension, HasMailHandlerExtension
